name: Liyla and The Shadows of War
name_original: Liyla and The Shadows of War
description:
Liyla and The Shadows of War is an arcade game developed by Rasheed Abueideh. It was originally released in 2016. Rasheed Abueideh published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Liyla and The Shadows of War is available on iOS and Android.
